name: Poggits
description:
Help the poggit escape by giving it directions, but be careful.. Poggits can only do so much so if you don't think ahead you might find that they easily get out of your control!

Move the poggit around with the A, D and SPACE keys

You can only use each key so many times before the poggit stops listening to you!

This game was made in 24 hours for the #gmtkjam
